Landosol Empire
Landosol
Yuni
Grants an extra leader trait {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_PHILOSOPHY_OF_COGNITION_AND_DEVELOPMENT_NAME} to Yuni: {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_PHILOSOPHY_OF_COGNITION_AND_DEVELOPMENT_DESCRIPTION}
Knowledge of Erudites

Each Library gets a [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Writing great work slot, +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Point for each Campus district with a Library building. +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Work of Writing. Gain the Yunicopter unique unit with Electricity.
Princess Knight of Landosol
Grants an extra leader trait for each Landosol leader.
Philosophy of Cognition and Development

Every unit gets a free Promotion when produced or upgraded. Campus district and Theater Square district's adjacency bonuses both provide [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Mines over strategic resources provide +1 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture.

Yuni, the most talented student of the St. Theresa's Girl Academy, leave the ivory tower and start your exploration with knowledge you have learned. Together with your wisdom and companions, you will reveal truths of the world. Understand changes of everything, and lead your people to get rid of ignorance, so that history will remember your name and achievements.
Guildhouse

Landosol unique building. Districts in this city provide +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type (for example, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points from the Theater Square district).
Yunicopter

Landosol unique Modern era support unit when Yuni is their leader that replaces the Drone. Cheaper to produce, unlocked by Electricity, and adds +1 [ICON_Range] Range and +5 [ICON_Bombard] Bombard Strength to Siege class units within 1 hex.
Royal Palace Order Cannon

Landosol unique Renaissance era siege unit that replaces the Bombard. Cannot move and attack on the same turn unless they've earned the Expert Crew promotion. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. land and naval units.
Little Model Student

Commercial Hubs, Harbors, Theater Squares and Industrial Zones that are adjacent to a Campus or Spaceport provide +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type (Theater Square provide [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points), and their adjacency bonuses provide [ICON_Science] Science as well (do not stack with the same effects, for example, Free Inquiry Golden Age). Additional [ICON_Production] Production when in a Golden Age.
Cosmo Blue Flash

Ranged units receive +1 [ICON_Range] Range in land tiles adjacent to a River or Coast. Campuses are granted a Major adjacency with Rivers, and if built adjacent to a Coast provide +1 [ICON_Science] Science to all Coast tiles, +3 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_Production] Production to all Ocean tiles in the city they are in.
{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_DESCRIPTION_SHARED} +15% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to Cities with a Spaceport.
Grants an extra leader trait {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_NAME} for Kyoka: {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_DESCRIPTION}
{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_DESCRIPTION_SHARED} +15% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +3 [ICON_Power] Power to Cities with a Spaceport.
Grants an extra leader trait {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_NAME} for Kyoka: {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_COSMOBLUE_FLASH_DESCRIPTION_XP2}
Kyoka

Kyoka, you have maturity needed for being a leader since your childhood. Your people are proud of you and see you as their model. You are diligent and wise, leading people to explore blue seas and skies with guide of starlight. Start grand adventures with your allies, and dig deep into the universe. But be cautious, for your suspicious enemies are gazing upon your land.
Pure White Revelation

Cities with a National Park receive +10% [ICON_Faith] Faith. Charming or Breathtaking tiles adjacent to Mountains, Woods, or Natural Wonders receive +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Additional +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from Mysticism. Gain the Miko of Ameth unique unit with Mercantilism.
Aurora Sanctuary
Kokkoro (Princess)
Miko of Ameth

Kokkoro's unique civilian unit that replaces the Naturalist. Cheaper to purchase than the Naturalist it replaces. Can create a single National Park to attract [ICON_Tourism] tourists. May convert [ICON_Citizen] Citizens to their Religion and initiate theological combat with units of other Religions. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Ameth has sent you a new oracle, little guide Kokkoro. Magnificent nature is your source of power, and you will protect your people and allies steadily with its help. If you can have strong conviction, your calls will be answered by your patron deity. Go forth with blessings of wind spirits, and surely you will be successful in every endeavour.
